name: Hidy - Find Hidden Objects
description:
«Hidy - Find Hidden Objects» is a new casual game where you'll be searching for hidden objects!

Try to find out all the hidden objects in the beautifully detailed picture, search for highlighted items and complete hidden object challenges. Sounds quite casual and easy, hah? Will you dare to find all missing items and pass all quests?

Get ready for an incredible adventure in the mystery world! If you're looking for the best hidden objects game for both adults and children, you reached the right place!

Game features:
- Lots of levels to explore and regular updates.
- Find hidden objects in limited time. Use tips if you get confused.
- Challenging tasks: those objects are not that easy to spot!
- Incredible adventure suits both adults and children.
- Original graphics scenes.

Try it out and enjoy quests if you adore hidden object casual games!

Privacy Policy: https://wannaplay.gg/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://wannaplay.gg/hidy-terms/
